price: Kuma Wanda Ya saukar da ruwa daga sama, a kan wani gwargwado, sai Muka rãyar da gari matacce game da shi. Kamar haka nan ake fitar da ku (daga kabari).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
